title: Zachariah, The Banner of Noxus
body:
Lore: Zachariah had little to lose, and all to give, for his kingdom of Noxus. An unyielding soldier who was nothing more than a banner bearer, Zachariah pushed beyond all. Through the marshes, deserts, badlands and fields, his feet unyielding to the exhaustion and fatigue, carrying aloft his proud banner, shouting and screaming at all who passed him the glory of Noxus. His voice, though hoarse from his years of preaching, carried a force that made allies feel filled with vigor, and enemies filled with dread, for if the harsh elements and the haze of battle couldn't stop the march of Zachariah, what could. Armor broken and clothes torn, he never stops his march as he remains determined to preach to his foes the pride he holds for his homeland, and to reassure those of his allies who have lost faith.

Innate Passive: Noxian Pride
The banner Zachariah carries projects an aura that grants nearby allies X% Movement Speed and X% Attack Speed, while reducing enemy Movement speed by X% and Attack Speed by X% (Scales with level)

Q: Screeching Resolve
Passive: X/X/X/X% Tenacity
Active: Zachariah screams at the top of his lungs to encourage nearby allies to be strong, granting a X/X/X/X(+X% AP) Shield for X seconds. While the shield is active, it grants X/X/X/X Bonus Attack Damage

W: Fear-Mongering Cry
Passive: X/X/X/X% movement speed when moving towards an enemy
Active: Zachariah gives a blood-curdling scream as he induces dread to all enemies in a cone in front of him, dealing X/X/X/X(+X% AP) magic damage and fearing all enemies for X/X/X/X seconds

E: For Noxus!
Passive: X/X/X/X% damage reduction from enemy auto attacks
Active: Zachariah Charges at the enemy, dealing X/X/X/X(+X% AD) Physical Damage, slowing the target by X% for X seconds and leaves a path behind him, granting X/X/X/X Movement speed and X/X/X/X Armor and Magic Resistance. The trail last for X seconds

R: Martyrdom
Passive: Upon Death, Zachariah gives his final shout of pride, then after the delay, he detonates, dealing X/X/X(+X%AP)
Active: Zachariah gives a mocking scream, taunting all nearby enemies in the medium sized area for X/X/X seconds, while giving himself X/X/X% Movement speed and X/X/X% Attack Speed for the duration
